<< /content //COLOR_ALPHA /width 640 /height 480 >> surface context
1 g set-source
paint
n 461.421875 381.421875 m 404.222656 438.621094 318.199219 455.730469 243.464844 424.777344 c 168.726562 393.820312 120 320.890625 120 240 c
0 g set-source
10 set-line-width
stroke+
1 0.2 0.2 0.6 rgba set-source
n 330 240 m 330 245.523438 325.523438 250 320 250 c 314.476562 250 310 245.523438 310 240 c 310 234.476562 314.476562 230 320 230 c 325.523438 230 330 234.476562 330 240 c
fill+
n 461.421875 381.421875 m 320 240 l 120 240 l 320 240 l
6 set-line-width
stroke+
pop
